Package model.updatestrategy

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AUpdateStrategy<TDispMsg>
    An abstract implementation of IUpdateStrategy.
    BreathingUpdateStrategy<TDispMsg>
    breathing strategy: ball sinusoidally changes radius.
    CollideUpdateStrategy
    Elastic collision behavior.
    ColorUpdateStrategy<TDispMsg>
    color strategy: ball changing color every movement.
    CurveUpdateStrategy<TDispMsg>
    the curve moving strategy.
    DrunkenUpdateStrategy<TDispMsg>
    drunken strategy: balls change direction in every movement.
    EatUpdateStrategy
    Set up a MultiInteractStrategy which contains a "eat" interaction strategy that eats another Ball when they interact and increases this Ball's area.
    EscapeUpdateStrategy
    Set up a MultiInteractStrategy which contains an escape interaction strategy that teleport to another location when two balls interact.
    FlashUpdateStrategy
    When two balls overlap, both of which will flash while overlapping.
    FreezeUpdateStrategy
    Set up a MultiInteractStrategy which contains a "freeze" interaction strategy that sets the other Ball's velocity to zero when they interact.
    InfectUpdateStrategy
    When two balls overlap, make the other ball also an infect ball.
    InverseUpdateStrategy
    Set up a MultiInteractStrategy which contains a "inverse" interaction strategy that sets another Ball's velocity to its opposite when they interact.
    KillUpdateStrategy
    Set up a MultiInteractStrategy which contains a "kill" interaction strategy that kills another Ball when they interact.
    MultiUpdateStrategy<TDispMsg>
    Multiple strategies: enables dynamically combined strategies.
    OverlapUpdateStrategy
    Detects whether two balls overlap.
    SimilarColorUpdateStrategy
    Detects whether two balls have similar colors and overlap.
    SpawnUpdateStrategy
    Spawn new balls when the ball contacts another one.
    StayAwayUpdateStrategy
    Detect if two balls are less than 20 distance away.
    StraightUpdateStrategy<TDispMsg>
    straight moving strategy.
    SwitcherUpdateStrategy<TDispMsg>
    switcher strategy class: able to update strategy after ball generated.
    WanderUpdateStrategy<TDispMsg>
    wander strategy: ball randomly go forward or backward.
